login.title: Access knitting patterns made just for you.
login.content: Create an account or log in to discover a world of custom creations and start knitting with patterns perfectly tailored to your needs.
login.name: Name

home.title: Welcome to Thalisy, the digital workshop for your knitting creations!
home.content: With Thalisy, create custom knitting patterns in just a few clicks, tailored to your tastes, style, and needs. Simplify your knitting projects with personalized suggestions and an intuitive interface. No need to search for complicated patterns anymoreâ€”let your creativity take the lead!

forgetPassword.title: Reset your password
forgetPassword.content: Please enter your email address below. We will send you a link to reset your password.
forgetPassword.sent.message: An email will be sent very soon

error.login.404: This email does not match any account.
error.default: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.subscribe.409: This email is already in use.
error.subscribe.success: Your account has been successfully created.
error.change.password: An error occurred while changing the password.
error.numberStitches.format: The number of stitches should be between 4 and 100
error.numberRows.format: The number of rows should be between 4 and 100
error.height.format: The height should be between 2cm and 40cm
error.needles.format: The needles size should be between 0 and 25
error.update.username: An error occurred while updating the username.
error.download: An error occurred while downloading the pattern.
error.createPattern: An error occured while creating the pattern
error.subscribe.400: One of the fields is incorrect

file.image: Only JPG, PNG, SVG or GIF files are allowed

success.subscribe: Your account has been successfully created.
success.change.password: Your password has been successfully changed
success.create.pattern: Your pattern has been successfully created
success.update.image: Your image has been successfully updated

yarn.title: Last step, knit your sample and mesure it !
yarn.name: Sample

size.body.name: Size of the body
size.sleeve.name: Size of the sleeves
size.width.name: Width
size.name: size
size.body.information: The desired garment body length from end to end
size.width.information: The desired garment body width from end to end
size.height.information: The desired garment body height from top to bottom
size.sleeve.information: The desired sleeve length from shoulder to wrist
size.empty.information: Click on a dropdown menu to get more information

collar.name: collar
collar.round.information: A round neck is a circular neckline that sits close to the base of the neck, commonly seen in t-shirts and sweaters.
collar.v.information: A V-neck is a neckline shaped like the letter "V" plunging downwards from the shoulders to the chest.
collar.turtle.information: A turtleneck is a high neckline that covers most or all of the neck, often folded down for a classic look.
collar.empty.information: Click on an option to get more information

sleeve.name: sleeves
sleeve.straight.information: Straight sleeves offer a simple and classic fit, snug along the entire
sleeve.puffy.information: Puff sleeves are characterized by their ample volume, often gathered at the wrist for a romantic and dramatic effect.
sleeve.flared.information: Flared sleeves gradually widen towards the bottom, adding a touch of flow and elegance.
sleeve.empty.information: Click on an option to get more information

contact.title: Ask us !
contact.content: If you have questions about certain paramters or techniques

beanieBorder.name: Brim
beanieBorder.simple.information: The single border is folded once, providing an elegant and subtle finish.
beanieBorder.double.information: The double border is folded twice, offering a thicker and more structured finish.
beanieBorder.none.information: None means the edge is not folded at all, giving a natural and relaxed look.
beanieBorder.empty.information: Click on an option to get more information

beanieSize.name: Size
beanieSize.length.information: The desired beanie length from end to end
beanieSize.width.information: The desired beanie width from end to end
beanieSize.empty.information: Click on a dropdown menu to get more information

download.title: Congratulations! Your unique pattern is now ready.
download.content: Your custom pattern is ready to use. Give a name to your pattern and get ready to bring your creation to life by knitting exactly what you imagined!
download.noPatternNameMessage: If you don't want to give a personalized name to your pattern, it will be named "Pattern" by default
download.generateError: A problem happened while generating the pattern, please try again

empty.title: No patterns found
empty.content:
No patterns have been shared yet.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: Complete the form, and send us a message, to allow the Thalisy team to help you.
